about_the_game:
Good afternoon, classmates!

“Past in DinningHall” is a 2D RPG game set in the backdrop of a Chinese school cafeteria. In this game, players take on the role of a student, engaging in a thrilling battle for food in the bustling cafeteria environment. Not only do players have to survive until the end of the semester, but they also need to manage their physical condition within the daily cafeteria operating hours to ensure a balanced diet.

Game Features

Unique Art Style The game features a pixel art style that transports you back to the memorable days of school life.

Rich Gameplay Experience the real-life scenario of queueing and cutting in line in the cafeteria, challenging you to move quickly through the crowded lines.

Authentic Interactive Experience Interact with NPCs and feel their emotions. Be careful not to let their anger levels get too high, or you might trigger a dispute.

Dynamic Gaming Environment Random events such as changes in queue numbers and NPC behaviors make each game session full of challenges.

Diverse Endings Depending on the player’s performance, the game will have different endings. Will you graduate successfully?

“Past in DinningHall” offers a unique taste of school life. Join this entertaining battle for food in the cafeteria today!
detailed_description:
Tip

You are currently experiencing the Demo version of the game, so some content may be incomplete or the effects may not be optimized. Please understand. The Demo version is for reference only and does not represent the final game quality.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: Apple only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Past in DinningHall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630M or Higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Past in DinningHall" is a 2D RPG where players, as students, navigate a Chinese school cafeteria's busy environment to compete for food. The goal is to not only endure until semester's end but also to manage health during cafeteria hours for a balanced diet.
